com.stormpath.sdk.cache.CacheManager

    • Uses of CacheManager in com.stormpath.sdk.cache

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.cache that return CacheManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CacheManager CacheManagerBuilder.build()
      Returns a new CacheManager instance reflecting Builder's current configuration.
      static CacheManager Caches.newDisabledCacheManager()
      Instantiates a new CacheManager that disables caching entirely.

    • Uses of CacheManager in com.stormpath.sdk.client

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.client with parameters of type CacheManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.setCacheManager(CacheManager cacheManager)
      Sets the CacheManager that should be used to cache Stormpath REST resources, reducing round-trips to the Stormpath API server and enhancing application performance.

    • Uses of CacheManager in com.stormpath.sdk.ds

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.ds that return CacheManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CacheManager DataStore.getCacheManager()
      Returns the CacheManager used to improve data store performance.

    • Uses of CacheManager in com.stormpath.sdk.hazelcast

      Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.hazelcast that implement CacheManager 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HazelcastCacheManager
      A CacheManager implementation that manages and returns Cache instances backed by Hazelcast Maps.

    • Uses of CacheManager in com.stormpath.spring.cache

    • Uses of CacheManager in com.stormpath.spring.config

      Methods in com.stormpath.spring.config that return CacheManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CacheManager AbstractStormpathConfiguration.stormpathCacheManager() 
      CacheManager StormpathConfiguration.stormpathCacheManager() 
      Methods in com.stormpath.spring.config with parameters of type CacheManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClientFactoryBean.setStormpathCacheManager(CacheManager cacheManager)
      Calls clientBuilder.setCacheManager using the specified Stormpath CacheManager instance, but note: This method should only be used if the Stormpath SDK should use a different CacheManager than what Spring uses.
